entry.title: Monday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 8 May 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers. High 20. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud near noon with 30 percent chance of showers in the afternoon. Risk of a thunderstorm in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. High 20. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 8 May 2023
